name: parseable
description: Parseable is an open-source, self-hosted log management system built for low-cost ingestion, querying, and retention. It offers real-time analytics, dashboards, and S3 support.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: High-performance log collection from multiple sources with support for various formats and protocols

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Query and analyze logs in real-time with SQL-like syntax for immediate insights into system behavior

features.title: S3 Storage
features.description: Store logs in S3-compatible object storage for cost-effective, scalable long-term retention

features.title: Custom Dashboards
features.description: Build visual dashboards with charts and graphs to monitor key metrics and log patterns over

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful API enables programmatic log ingestion, querying, and integration with external tools and workflows
